    • Constructor Detail

      • RamerDouglasPeuckerFilter

        public RamerDouglasPeuckerFilter(double epsilon)
        Parameters:
        epsilon - epsilon in Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm (maximum distance of a point in data between original curve and simplified curve)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when epsilon <= 0
